title: Level-Up: Learning to Improve Proficiency Level of Essays
authors:
Han, Wen-Bin  and
Chen, Jhih-Jie  and
Yang, Chingyu  and
Chang, Jason
venue: Proceedings of the 57th Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics: System Demonstrations
abstract: We introduce a method for generating suggestions on a given sentence for improving the proficiency level. In our approach, the sentence is transformed into a sequence of grammatical elements aimed at providing suggestions of more advanced grammar elements based on originals. The method involves parsing the sentence, identifying grammatical elements, and ranking related elements to recommend a higher level of grammatical element. We present a prototype tutoring system, Level-Up, that applies the method to English learnersâ€™ essays in order to assist them in writing and reading. Evaluation on a set of essays shows that our method does assist user in writing.
